mongoUri: Insert here your mongoUri connection string

mqtt.brokerUsername: Choose a user name for connecting to your MQTT broker
mqtt.brokerPassword: Choose a password for connecting to your MQTT broker

jwt.jwtSecret: Generate a random 256-bit string from https://generate.plus/en/base64

comment: Fill in the fields above and rename this file to 'default.json' ! More details at https://github.com/esyywar/OpenGrow-IoT-Plant-Monitor
